Package com.example.DirectoryNode.Controller

Class DirectoryNodeController

java.lang.Object
com.example.DirectoryNode.Controller.DirectoryNodeController
@RequestMapping("/api/nodes") @RestController @CrossOrigin public class DirectoryNodeController extends Object
A controller for the directory node.

      @PostMapping("/") public void addNewNodeToTheList(InputStream inputStream)

    • removeNodeFromTheList

      @DeleteMapping("/") public void removeNodeFromTheList(@RequestParam(name="portNumber") int portNumber)
      A method to remove a node from the directory node register.
      Parameters:
      portNumber - The port number for the node to be removed.

    • makePath

      @GetMapping("/") public String makePath()
      A method to create a path across all registered nodes.
      Returns:
      Returns the created path.

    • getNodeList

      @GetMapping("/nodeList") public ArrayList<NodeInfo> getNodeList()
      A method to send the list of nodes registered.
      Returns:
      Returns a new array of the nodes registered.

    • getPublicKeys

      @GetMapping("/publickey") public List<byte[]> getPublicKeys()
      A method which sends the public keys registered.
